title: Design
description: I love when software comes with good design. I took an Interaction Design course to improve my designs and am comfortable with design tools such as Photoshop.

title: Software
description: When developing software I focus on clear code design, extensive test suites, proper documentation, and maintainability. I believe great apps start with great code.

title: Communication
description: From defining clear requirements with users to presenting one's ideas, I believe frequent and effective communication is of great value and I try to improve as much as posible.
